page.title: 04Trade.
page.content: There are no large departmental stores, only small shops, but they mostly provide the locals with their every day requirements. A large number of gift shops cater for the tourists as do the numerous cafes and restaurants some of which are open all the year round. A tourist information bureau is situated on the lawn which provides tourists with information about the area. During the summer there are often market type sales on the lawn along with various fayres held by local organisations. The banks are well represented and there is a modern Post Office.
